patthana10.1:2.1.pli: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
